name: Bouncy Bonky
description: Baby octopus Bouncy is being bothered by mischievous double Bonky. It was thought that these were on the same side, but the two boys also wandered in the warm Southern sea to hunt. Standing between two, what should a baby octopus do to survive? How do those puffins get the prey here? Unknowingly all 3 have become archenemies. As above, so below! "Bouncy," use the shield to counterattack. "Bonky" spit out colorful balls to win.
